poll_list.title: Increase the PSM-GUSD Debt Ceiling - February 14, 2022

discourse_list.title: [Signal Request] Raise Gemini Dollar (GUSD) PSM Debt Ceiling To 60 Million DAI

content.content: Overview The newly onboarded PSM-GUSD has a debt ceiling of 10m DAI, and is currently close to capacity. In order to increase diversification of stablecoin reserves, GFX Labs is signaling to raise this debt ceiling to 60 million DAI. This would represent approximately 32% of the outstanding GUSD float, and is in line with what could be covered by the Stability Buffer in a worst-case scenario. An informal consultation with Risk indicated that this was within acceptable range. Pros: -More DAI in circulation. -Another asset in the portfolio of peg management (PSM-USDC, PSM-USDP, Gelato tokens, some UNI LP tokens). Cons: -Material exposure to another centralized, redeemable stablecoin.    Should The PSM-GUSD Debt Ceiling Be Raised To 60 Million DAI?  Yes No Abstain     0 voters     Next Steps This poll will run until 2022-02-08T05:00:00Z. An outcome favoring Yes over No will result in an on-chain poll. An outcome favoring No over Yes will result in no action taken at this time.
content.GPT-summary: The post is a proposal to raise the debt ceiling of PSM-GUSD to 60 million DAI. The author explains the proposal and lists the pros and cons. The post also includes a poll for community feedback. A 3rd party could give constructive criticism or ask questions about the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: I reset the vote to match the guidelines on limiting to voters with TL2 or above. For the one person who voted before I got there, please vote again
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal

content.content: Thanks for all that voted, with only 1 non-abstaining vote against this proposal, it will be moving on chain on Monday, February 14th. MKR voters will vote on the proposal to increase the GUSD PSM Debt Ceiling to 60M DAI. The on-chain poll will last until Thursday, February 17th. If a majority of MKR voting is in favor, it will then need an executive proposal to change the Debt Ceiling. Please let me know if there are any questions about this process

This Signal Request passed on-chain. It will be included in a future executive vote. Please note that the next executive vote is scheduled for 2022-02-25 and the included contents will be announced nearer the time.
GPT-discussion-categories: None of the topics listed match

content.content: This topic was automatically closed 30 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
